title: Firms visited or required meetings with tax officials (% of firms)
name: ic.frm.metg.zs
readme: Percentage of firms that were visited or inspected by tax officials or were required to meet with them over the last year.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Percentage of firms that were visited or inspected by tax officials or were required to meet with them over the last year.
